PortletCategory.description: Generics portlets usable for easily parametrize portalPages

PortalPortlet.description: a portlet which included a portalPage to be able to have multiple line, each line being a sub page. This portlet has 1 mandatory parameters.
Simple search criteria, only Id (param idName) and description for entityList, result is sent to List${Entity}Area (FindGenericEntityPrtl define this area). This portel has 3 mandatory parameters.
Simple portlet using screenlet, with one screen. This portlet has 3 mandatory parameters.

PortalPortlet.portletName: Screenlet with one screen called by ajax
PortalPortlet.description: Simple portlet using screenlet, with one screen which was update by ajax process, so with a div. This portlet has 4 mandatory parameters.

PortalPortlet.portletName: Screenlet with one screen, and one menu called by ajax
PortalPortlet.description: Simple portlet using screenlet with a menu, with one screen which was update by ajax process, so with a div. This portlet has 6 mandatory parameters.

PortalPage.description: To be able to have parameters at the portlet level, not PortletPage level

PortletType.description: use screen and screen location in the portletDecorator
depending of scriptName, menuName and screenName exist a screen with call (or not) scriptName in action and include a screenlet with include formName (or screenName) and include (or not) menuName

include a list type form (do not use screenName) and an editing area, depending of scriptName and menuName exist a screen with call (or not) scriptName in action and include a screenlet with include formName and include (or not) menuName
a empty screen, used to define a areaId

PortalPortlet.description: Use this portlet to say where detail portlet call from a menu will be show
